articles.author: Miguel Dumaual, ABS-CBN News
articles.title: Rabiya and Miss Thailand wanted to hold hands at conclusion of Miss Universe. They still made it happen. - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: “It’s a fact that Philippines and Thailand are two powerhouses in Asia, and I want to raise the banner of being Asian in an international stage.”
articles.content: Leading up to the Miss Universe coronation night, the representatives of neighboring Philippines and Thailand picked each other as the one who they would want to hold hands with as the final two stan… [+3164 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Thailand reports daily record of Covid-19 cases, including jail clusters - The Star Online
articles.description: BANGKOK (Reuters): Thailand reported on Monday (May 17) a daily record of 9,635 new coronavirus cases, including 6,853 infections among prisoners from jail clusters, as the Southeast Asian country struggles with a third wave of infections.

articles.title: Primary, secondary schools and JCs to shift to full home-based learning from 19 May, amid new strains of COVID-19 in S'pore: Minister Chan Chun Sing - The Online Citizen Asia
